ygData.subject: Re: More Charismat Carrilon data
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t believe gargoyles have a faction though do they?  Possibly the ones at Mistmoore Ka`Lend, 24th Wood Elven Bard on Rallos Zek ... From: John Robertson
ygData.messageBody:
I don't believe gargoyles have a faction though do they? Possibly the ones
at Mistmoore


Ka`Lend, 24th Wood Elven Bard on Rallos Zek

-----Original Message-----
From: John Robertson [mailto:johnr@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 3:13 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] More Charismat Carrilon data


From: "John Robertson" <johnr@...>

> >
> > - Singing the song at an NPC who "scowls at you ready to attack"
> > doesn't seem to
> > do anything.
>
> I tried it on a Nektulos Guard (Dark Elf lands) and changed him from
> "scowls and ready to attack" to "looks at me threateningly"... he
> still chased me out of their forest as I got a bit too close while
> trying to charm him :)

Interesting. I used it on a gargoyle, and he went from "Scowls at you ready
to attack" to "beating the crap out of me". :)

I don't think it was the song that caused it though, and I'm pretty sure the
song had no effect before he saw me.

Jyzan
